name: One Track Mind
description:
Play as a malfunctioning robot with a one track mind, it's your job to control the little fella and defeat the rogue robots  This is my first game jam so if you have any constructive criticism I'd love to hear it.

Controls

Move - WASD Keys

Rotate - W & D Keys

Attack - Left mouse button or ctrl button

Press escape to quit, the level will restart when all robots are shut down

Credits

Apart from the music I made everything myself! 

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Pixelland" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
